title: Family Owned
text: McNa's Glass is a family-owned and operated company based in Eastern Heights, servicing the city of Ipswich and the greater region. We provide a genuine, quality service with a wealth of knowledge and experience within the glazing industry.

title: 24 Hour Service
text: Broken glass can be a severe health hazard for you, your family or your business. Our professional glaziers are qualified and are on call 24/7 for emergency repair service. You can rest assured we will clean up the site and dispose of glass, to eliminate further damage or harm.

title: Customer Service
text: We pride ourselves on being a reliable, friendly, affordable service that has our customers' best interests at heart. Our staff will communicate honestly with you no matter the problem to achieve the best and safest solution.
